interfaces.name: UiBrand
interfaces.sourceCode:
export interface UiBrand {
  logo: string
  name: string
  color?: string
  product?: string
  separator?: string
  description?: string
}

interfaces.name: UiButton
interfaces.sourceCode:
export interface UiButton {
  label?: string
  icon?: string
  iconAfter?: string
  className?: string
  path?: string
  url?: string
  action?: string
  disabled?: boolean
  queryParams?: { [k: string]: any }
  payload?: any
  handler?: (...params) => void
  [key: string]: any
}

interfaces.name: UiCard
UiComment
interfaces.sourceCode:
import { UiUser } from './ui-user'
import { UiButton } from './ui-button'

export interface UiComment {
  id?: string
  text: string
  path?: string
  author?: UiUser
  created?: Date | number | string
  commentCount?: number
  comments?: UiComment[]
  buttons?: UiButton[]
  [key: string]: any
}

  queryParams?: any
  children?: UiLink[]
}

components.templateData: {{ bottomLink.label }}

components.name: UiAvatarComponent
UiBrandComponent
components.template: {{ brand?.name }} {{ brand?.separator }} {{ brand?.product }}

components.name: UiButtonComponent
components.template:
<ng-container *ngIf="isLink">
  <ui-link [linkClass]="btnClass" [link]="button"></ui-link>
</ng-container>
<ng-container *ngIf="isAction">
  <button
    [disabled]="disabled || button?.disabled"
    [class]="btnClass"
    (click)="action.emit(button)"
  >
    <ui-loading-icon *ngIf="loading" [class.mr-2]="loadingClass" [icon]="loadingIcon">
    </ui-loading-icon>
    <ui-label
      [label]="button?.label"
      [icon]="button?.icon"
      [iconAfter]="button?.iconAfter"
    ></ui-label>
  </button>
</ng-container>
<ng-container *ngIf="isHandler">
  <button
    [disabled]="disabled || button?.disabled"
    [class]="btnClass"
    (click)="button.handler({ type: button.action, payload: button.payload })"
  >
    <ui-loading-icon *ngIf="loading" [class.mr-2]="loadingClass" [icon]="loadingIcon">
    </ui-loading-icon>
    <ui-label
      [label]="button?.label"
      [icon]="button?.icon"
      [iconAfter]="button?.iconAfter"
    ></ui-label>
  </button>
</ng-container>

components.name: UiButtonsComponent
components.template:
<ng-container *ngFor="let button of buttons; let first = first; let last = last">
  <ui-button
    class="btn-group"
    [class.first]="first && !last"
    [class.middle]="!first && !last"
    [class.last]="last && !first"
    (action)="action.emit($event)"
    [button]="button"
    [buttonClass]="buttonClass"
  ></ui-button>
</ng-container>

<ngx-numbered-codeblock
  [code]="code || data"
  [languague]="language"
  [lineNumbers]="numbers"
></ngx-numbered-codeblock>

components.name: UiCommentComponent
components.template:
{{ comment?.author?.name }} {{ comment?.author?.username }} {{ comment?.created | timeago }}
{{ comment?.text }}
components.sourceCode:
import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, Output } from '@angular/core' import { UiComment } from '../../interfaces/ui-comment' @Component({ selector: 'ui-comment', template: `
{{ comment?.author?.name }} {{ comment?.author?.username }} {{ comment?.created | timeago }}
{{ comment?.text }}
`, styles: [ ` :host { display: block; } `, ], }) export class UiCommentComponent { @Input() comment?: UiComment @Input() deleteButton = false @Output() action = new EventEmitter() }

components.name: UiCommentFormComponent
UiContentComponent
UiDataComponent
components.template:
<ng-container *ngIf="data as res">
  <ng-template
    [ngTemplateOutlet]="outlet"
    [ngTemplateOutletContext]="{
      data: select ? res.data[select] : res.data,
      errors: res.errors,
      loading: res.loading
    }"
  >
  </ng-template>
  <ng-container *ngIf="debug && res">
    <ui-debug label="ui-data" [data]="res"></ui-debug>
  </ng-container>
</ng-container>

components.name: UiDebugComponent
components.template:
{{ label }} 
{{ json ? (data | json) : data }}

import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, OnInit, Output } from '@angular/core' @Component({ selector: 'ui-dropdown', template: `
  • {{ item.value }}
`, styles: [], }) export class UiDropdownComponent { @Input() items: { [key: string]: string } @Input() selected: string @Output() changeSelected = new EventEmitter() }

components.name: UiFormComponent
UiHeaderComponent
components.sourceCode:
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core' import { UiBrand } from '../interfaces/ui-brand' import { UiLink } from '../interfaces/ui-link' @Component({ selector: 'ui-header', template: `
`, }) export class UiHeaderComponent { @Input() public brand: UiBrand @Input() public fluid = false @Input() public links: UiLink[] = [] @Input() public style: 'light' | 'dark' = 'dark' public navBarOpen = false toggleNavBar() { this.navBarOpen = !this.navBarOpen } }

components.name: UiHeroComponent
components.template:
{{ title }}

{{ description }}

{{ card.content }}
components.sourceCode:
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core' import { UiCard } from '../../interfaces/ui-card' import { UiLink } from '../../interfaces/ui-link' import { UiBrand } from '../../interfaces/ui-brand' import { UiAvatarSizes } from '../ui-avatar/ui-avatar.component' import { UiBrandSizes } from '../ui-brand/ui-brand.component' @Component({ selector: 'ui-hero', template: `

{{ title }}

{{ description }}

{{ card.content }}
`, styles: [ ` .row { margin: -48px 12px 0; } `, ], }) export class UiHeroComponent { @Input() avatar: string @Input() avatarSize: UiAvatarSizes = 'xl' @Input() brand: UiBrand @Input() brandSize: UiBrandSizes = 'lg' @Input() centered = true @Input() link: UiLink @Input() linkClass = 'btn btn-lg btn-outline-success' @Input() title?: string @Input() description?: string @Input() cards: UiCard[] = [] }

variables.name: COMPONENTS
variables.defaultValue:
[
  UiAuthComponent,
  UiDialogFormComponent,
  UiDialogProgressComponent,
  UiDropdownComponent,
  UiHeaderComponent,
  UiLayoutComponent,
  UiListComponent,
  UiListItemComponent,
  UiLoadingComponent,
  UiPageSidebarComponent,
  UiPageSidebarRouteComponent,
  UiRenderComponent,
  UiSidebarComponent,
  UiSidebarItemComponent,
  UiTabsComponent,
  UiUserComponent,
]

variables.name: config
variables.defaultValue:
{
  types: [],
  validationMessages: [
    { name: 'required', message: 'This field is required' },
    { name: 'minlength', message: minlengthValidationMessage },
    { name: 'maxlength', message: maxlengthValidationMessage },
    { name: 'min', message: minValidationMessage },
    { name: 'max', message: maxValidationMessage },
    { name: 'email', message: emailValidatorMessage },
  ],
  validators: [{ name: 'email', validation: emailValidator }],
}

variables.name: EXPORT_MODULES
variables.defaultValue:
[
  CommonModule,
  BsDropdownModule,
  ModalModule,
  TabsModule,
  // Ui Modules will be exported until version 2
  UiAvatarModule,
  UiBrandModule,
  UiButtonModule,
  UiCardModule,
  UiCodeModule,
  UiCommentModule,
  UiContentModule,
  UiDebugModule,
  UiFooterModule,
  UiFormModule,
  UiHeroModule,
  UiLabelModule,
  UiLinkModule,
  UiLinksModule,
  UiLoadingIconModule,
  UiNoDataModule,
]

variables.name: randInt
variables.defaultValue:
(min: number, max: number): number =>
  Math.floor(Math.random() * (max - min)) + min
